entities.name: godrics hollow
entities.description: A village in the West Country where Godric Gryffindor was born and where Bowman Wright forged the first Golden Snitch.

entities.name: godric gryffindor
entities.description: The great wizard who was born in Godric's Hollow.

entities.name: bowman wright
entities.description: A Wizarding smith who forged the first Golden Snitch in Godric's Hollow.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: A student and friend of Harry Potter.

entities.name: professor bagshot
entities.description: An author who wrote a book about the history of magic.

relationships.description: Godric Gryffindor was born in Godric's Hollow.
Bowman Wright forged the first Golden Snitch in Godric's Hollow.
Harry Potter visited Godric's Hollow with his friends.
Dumbledore would have expected Harry to make the connection between Godric Gryffindor and Godric's Hollow.
